full_text: Blea hl Baer 2014/KER/205 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA ATERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Crl.MCNo. 17 of 20140 LP 144/2012 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, KARUNAGAPPALLY SC 216/1995 of ADDL.SUB COURT,KOLLAM Crl.MC 3919/2013 of HIGH COURT OF KERALA PETITIONER/44TH ACCUSED: NAVAS S/O. ABDUL REHUMAN KUNIJU, KADA YASSERIL VEEDU CHANGANKULANGARA, OACHIRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRLK.SIJU SMT.CHITHRA.S.BABU RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT AND STATE: STATE OF KERALA THROUGH THE DEPUTY SUPERINTENDENT OF POLICE KARUNAGAPPALLY,REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.SAREENA GEORGE THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Blea hl Baer 2014/KER/205 Crl.MC.No. 17 of 2014 0 APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE 1- TRUE COPY OF FIR. IN CRIME NO. 42/1992 OF OACHIRA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE 2- TRUE COPY OF FINAL REPORT FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT IN CRIME NO.42/1992 OF OACHIRA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE 3- THE COPY OF COMMON JUDGMENT PASSED BY THE ASST. SESSIONS COURT, KOLLAM IN S.C.NO. 216/1995, S.C.NO. 8/1996 AND S.C.NO. 25/1997 DATED 8-10-2002. ANNEXURE 4- THE COPY OF JUDGMENT IN CRL.M.C.NO. 2367/2005. ANNEXURE 5- THE COPY OF COMMON ORDER PASSED IN CRL.M.C.NO. 1690/2011 AND 1713/2011 DATED 13-6-2011. ANNEXURE 6- THE COPY OF ORDER IN CRL.M.C.NO. 3919/2013 DATED 10-9-2013. RESPONDENT(S)' EXHIBITS : NIL /TRUE COPY/ PATO JUDGE AV Biers) HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. 2014RERI20S Dated this the 2" day of January, 2014 ORDER Petitioner is the 44 accused in Crime No.42/1992 of Oachira Police Station pending as L.P.No.144/2012 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Karunagappally. The offences alleged are punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 324, 332, 333, 307, 120(b) read with Section 149 of IPC and Section 3(2)(a) of Prevention of Destruction of Public Properties Act. 2. Originally mob violence was registered on 01.04.1992 against 400 persons and final report was filed against 101 persons. 70 of the accused faced trial in S.C.Nos.216/1995, 8/1996 and 25/1997 before the Asst.Sessions Court, Kollam. The trial court acquitted all the accused persons finding that the injured police men failed to identify any of the accused. The trial court found that there is no evidence against the accused regarding criminal conspiracy and their involvement in the violence and all of them were acquitted. A copy of the judgment dt.08.10.2002 is produced as Annexure _ 3. Proceedings against other six accused were quashed by this Court through three separate judgments. Annexures 4, 5 and 6 are the copies of the said judgments. Biers) 2014/KER/205 Crl.M.C.No.17 of 2014 ; 3. It is submitted that even if trial is conducted no purpose will be served for the reasons stated by the learned Judge in Annexure 3 judgment. There is no possibility of the prosecution to end in conviction in the facts and circumstances of the case. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. All further proceedings in Crime No.42/1992 of Oachira Police Station against the petitioner pending as L.P.No.144/2012 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Karunagappally is quashed. Sd/- HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE. AV
